constituent: shrink, thread, spiderman, inn, house, person, hundred, one, ceiling, white, dove
koohiiStory1: After spending the night at an inn, spider man discovered to his dismay that his costume had shrunk in the wash, and no longer fit!
koohiiStory2: Don´t let the Inn wash your threads, they will shrink them!
kunYomi: ちぢ.む、ちぢ.まる、ちぢ.める、ちぢ.れる、ちぢ.らす
readingExamples: 縮まる (ちぢ.まる), 縮む (ちぢ.む), 縮める (ちぢ.める), 縮らす (ちぢ.らす), 縮れる (ちぢ.れる)
words:
短縮(たんしゅく): shortening, abbreviation, reduction
縮まる(ちぢまる): to be shortened, to be contracted, to shrink
圧縮(あっしゅく): compression, condensation, pressure
恐縮(きょうしゅく): shame, very kind of you, sorry to trouble
縮小(しゅくしょう): reduction, curtailment
縮む(ちぢむ): shrink, be contracted
縮める(ちぢめる): shorten, reduce, boil down, shrink
縮れる(ちぢれる): be wavy, be curled
